components.client

Interface ClientCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientOutPort

    public interface ClientCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI
    The ClientNodeOutCI interface represents the required interface that a client node component must implement to be able to send requests and receive query results.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sendAsyncRequest(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI req)
      Sends an asynchronous request to a client node component.
      fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI sendRequest(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI r)
      Sends a request and returns the query result.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequest

        fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI sendRequest(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI r)
                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends a request and returns the query result.
        Parameters:
        r - the request to send
        Returns:
        the query result
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs during request sending

      • sendAsyncRequest

        void sendAsyncRequest(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI req)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends an asynchronous request to a client node component. The method takes a RequestI object as a parameter and sends it to the client node for processing. The method does not block and returns immediately. If an error occurs during the request sending process, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        req - the request to send to the node
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs during the request sending process
